metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16115 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, a stack-based buffer under-read could be triggered inIdentityFunction::transform in Function.cc, used byGfxAxialShading::getColor. It can, for example, be triggered by sending acrafted PDF document to the pdftoppm tool. It allows an attacker to use acrafted PDF file to cause Denial of Service or possibly unspecified otherimpact.

criterions.comment: ipe package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
